subject: New York City Marathon
Handicapped
Autism
Families and Family Life
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, Nadine McNeil will race in the New York City Marathon on her handcycle for the fourth time while her autistic son, Tyler, runs the race for the first time.
snippet: On Sunday, Nadine McNeil will race in the New York City Marathon on her handcycle for the fourth time while her autistic son, Tyler, runs the race for the first time.
